scripts.start: npm run build:static && cp config/dev.theme._config.yml themes/mango-information-systems/_config.yml && npm run watch & hexo server & npm run watch:socketServer
scripts.build:test: npm run build:assets && cp config/test.theme._config.yml themes/mango-information-systems/_config.yml && hexo generate  --config config/test._config.yml
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:assets && cp config/prod.theme._config.yml themes/mango-information-systems/_config.yml && hexo generate  --config config/prod._config.yml
scripts.build:assets: npm run build:static && npm run build:js && npm run build:skeleton
scripts.postinstall: git submodule update --init --recursive; cd skeleton-framework; npm install
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:skeleton
scripts.watch:js: watchify dynamic/client.js -o source/js/site.js -v --poll=2000 & watchify -t brfs dynamic/g-realtime.js -o source/js/g-realtime.js -v --poll=2000
